entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:14 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 5:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few flurries this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
